text:
The IIS reference part of the ISAPI connector docs contains a paragraph about using the "error_page" configuration introduced in version 1.2.27.

It is a URL which can contain a "%d". The redirector will replace the %d with the HTTP status code and redirect the client to the resuting URL.

In order to control which status codes use that feature you need to activate the mapping extension "use_server_errors". It is documented on the reference page about uriworkermap.properties.
creator: rainer.jung@kippdata.de
